parameters.name: catalog_name
parameters.description: (string) Name of parent catalog for tables of interest.

parameters.name: schema_name_pattern
parameters.description: A sql LIKE pattern (% and _) for schema names. All schemas will be returned if not set or empty.

parameters.name: table_name_pattern
parameters.description: A sql LIKE pattern (% and _) for table names. All tables will be returned if not set or empty.

parameters.name: max_results
parameters.description: Maximum number of summaries for tables to return. If not set, the page length is set to a server configured value (10000, as of 1/5/2024).

parameters.name: page_token
parameters.description: Opaque pagination token to go to next page based on previous query.

parameters.name: include_manifest_capabilities
parameters.description: Whether to include a manifest containing capabilities the table has.

200.description: The table summaries list was successfully retrieved.

get.description: Gets an array of summaries for tables for a schema and catalog within the metastore. The table summaries returned are either:
